mapper.select: SELECT ID ,COMPANY_CODE ,ADMIN_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,CATEGORY ,CASE WHEN CATEGORY = 'E' THEN '긴급' WHEN CATEGORY = 'N' THEN '일반' WHEN CATEGORY = 'W' THEN '워닝' ELSE '일반' END AS CATEGORY_NAME ,DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_CONFIRM_COUNT ,DEPT_TOTAL ,DEPT_CONFIRM_YN ,CREATED_DATETIME ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATED_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATED_DATETIME ,REPLACE(REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(UPDATED_DATETIME, '%p %h:%i %m-%d-%Y'),'AM', '오전'),'PM','오후') AS CONVERSION_UPDATED_DATETIME FROM DP_ADV_ADMIN_NOTICE WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{adminId} ORDER BY CREATED_DATETIME DESC

SELECT DEPT_TOTAL FROM ( SELECT A.DEPT_CODE ,COUNT(A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_TOTAL FROM DP_ADV_AGENT A WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'N' GROUP BY A.DEPT_CODE )AA INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT DEPT_CODE FROM DP_ADV_DEPT WHERE DEPTH = '4' AND COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode}) B ON AA.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE WHERE AA.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,P_DEPT_CODE ,DEPTH ,COMPANY_CODE FROM DP_ADV_DEPT WHERE COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} ORDER BY DEPTH
